entry.title: Red in between the Lines
entry.summary:
Author: kimismiki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,008Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 5

Summary: As you jump into the never-ending, crime-centric city of Gotham, you'll navigate through Peter's lens. He is currently a Fashion Design intern for a company called Dhillon. Does it pay rent? Yes. Does it pay for a studio where he can design? Yes. Does he absolutely like doing it? No. But he still does it, because he has an ambition of rising to the top and working with all of the amazing designers in the city. Jumping in, Peter sits in the Spot, as he likes to call it, and is sketching away, for his next deadline- that he knows will be thrown onto him, once he gets through the upcoming Fashion Week. While he is sketching and admiring the flower store from across the way, a stranger taps him on the shoulder, handing back his wallet. The stranger, tall, almost brooding, with a weird "J" scar that brands his cheek, and a streak of white hair that only comes from his cowlick. This stranger has a weird temptation on Peter, begging him to know more, but also keep a distance, since you know, they're in Gotham.

Author: lushescape

entry.title: Crime Alley Kids (Red Hood Fanfic)
entry.summary:
Author: StephSquare

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,259Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: "I'm not joining your club". Sunny Blake had enough things going on in her life. As well as keeping up a horrible job to survive Gotham, she's now been asked to join the Young Justice for punishment? But as she's forced to be there, so is someone else. The Red Hood and Sunny Blake might be the only ones who absolutely can't stand being part of this group. But as Sunny's past comes back to haunt her, maybe the Red Hood is the only one to help her out. (On Wattpad as well! Also the first couple chapters are slightly rushed. But the overall story is big that I kinda have to rush stuff )

entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,977Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 178

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story‚Äîa quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting. At least, that‚Äôs what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns. No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she‚Äôs staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.

entry.title: An Eternity Together
entry.summary:
Author: BoggieBoat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,722Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Jason has never been good at feelings when it came to others outside of his family. He died before he could experience the classic "young love" mentioned in all of his favorite stories he's read, so to get resurrected suddenly and go through unimaginable trauma after reuniting with his family- he's not exactly "romance-ready", to say the least.So, what happens when he gets stuck in a never-ending time loop with only one other person? Will he choose to work with them to escape the time loop, and risk actually caring about someone who wasn't family? Or will he crack under the pressure of both reliving the same day hundreds of times, and knowing that he may be the only one of them to make it out in the end?

entry.summary:
Author: allblessingstoyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,926Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 13

Summary: After years of absence, Jason Todd returns to Gotham to pay respect at an old acquaintance's funeral. He retraces places linked to his old life, leading to a new beginning.
